content: a lot of people have mentioned my improper counts -- hope you all muddles through ok there have been a lot of helpful knitters who have suggested corrections here is artgal702 s errata which i m sure will be helpful row 82-92 of the body should read as such 82 k55 p k11 p2 k3 p2 7 times k11 p 83 k55 p k11 m1l p2 k3 p2 7 times m1r k11 p 84 k55 p k12 p2 k3 p2 7 times k12 p 85 k8 m1l k39 m1r k8 p k12 p2 k3 p2 7 times k12 p 86 k57 p k12 p2 k3 p2 7 times k12 p 87 repeat row 86 88 repeat row 86 89 k57 p k12 m1l p2 k3 p2 7 times m1r k12 p 90 k57 p k13 p2 k3 p2 7 times k13 p 91 k8 m1l k41 m1r k8 p k13 p2 k3 p2 7 times p2 k13 p 92 k59 p k13 p2 k3 p2 7 times k13 p in each row there s a p2 after the 7 k3 p2 s that doesn t make sense in the pattern row 121 of the body should read as follows 121 k47 k24 ssk k k2tog k24 row 157 of the body should read as 157 ssk k27 k2tog k15 ssk k k2tog k15 row 22 of the fins needs to have any two of the m1 stitches removed to add up in the rest of the pattern the top fin where you leave 7 on a holder is a bit confusing but shouldn t be too hard
